This product is worth more than $120 to me, but I'm willing to extend this opportunity to you at an exclusive price. For a limited time, you can experience its benefits at $150. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience with our top-tier offering. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer
